name: Art Block
description:
Art block is a breakout/Arkanoid clone. Play through each level to discover what art is hidden behind the blocks.

I made Art Block when I was learning Clickteam Fussion. I decided to polish what tutorial has to offer, add new levels, menus, graphics, etc.

I know everything is kind of bare bones, please, if you decide to play it, let me know what I can improve.
